name: Night Walk (digiorgiojoey@gmail.com)
description:
A little boy walks home from his friends one night. As he makes his way home, his imagination runs out of control with images of spooky monsters and occurrences.

Hi Everyone,

I put this together for the GMTK game jam 2020. The theme was "Out Of Control". This was my first time doing a game jam and my first publicly released game ever. It was made in Godot. I ran into some issues through out the jam (as expected) which led to a mostly unfinished product. I hope you all enjoy what I was able to implement in the 48 hours and look forward to creating some cool complete games in future jams.

- Joey DiGiorgio
